short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks sunscreen products on Amazon and provides buy/do not buy recommendations based on ingredients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choosing sunscreens for you and your children can be a minefield. 

Many products sounds safe and make claims like "paraben free" but still contain ingredients that, in 2022, the FDA ruled were NOT "generally recognized as safe and effective" (GRASE). 

This extension is only activated on Amazon product detail pages for sunscreen products and shows a badge indicating BUY or DO NOT BUY. 

Mousing over the badge will explain why the product was given the rating.

For every sunscreen product on Amazon, instantly see whether:

- the brand has provided their ingredients
- whether the product includes any ingredients which have NOT "generally recognized as safe and effective" by the FDA
- Meets the minimum recommended SPF
